h1.style: color: #4fc3f7; text-align: center; font-size: 3em; margin-bottom: 10px; text-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(79,195,247,0.4);

div.style: display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 15px; margin: 30px 0;

a.style: padding: 20px; font-size: 1.1em; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e94560 0%, #c72e4a 100%); color: white; border: none; border-radius: 3px; cursor: pointer; display: block; text-decoration: none; text-align: center;
